Specifications
Hardware Specifications
  • MSP430FR59941 Microcontroller
  • 12 V or 24 V Battery
  • 5 V Portable Battery For Microcontroller
  • HM-11 bluetooth module
    • ios and Android Compatible
  • DRV8424EVM Bipolar Stepper Motor Driver Evaluation Board
    • STEP / DIR
    • 0-35V at 4A
  • Stepper Motor
    • High Torque Motor
    • Linear Drive Screw
Software Specifications
  • MCU
    • C programming language
    • Code composer Studio
  • App
    • Cross-Platform Framework Flutter for simultaneous iOS and Android development
    • Flutter_Blue_Plus - Bluetooth library
    • VSCode
  • Both
    • Github
Texas A&M University Capstone Project
